CustomField.description: Set to true if your org uses iTools custom permissions to control access to iTools actions (i.e. iTools_AllowEditMySettings, iTools_AllowExportPrintView, iTools_ShowBuilderLink)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set to true if your org uses iTools custom permissions to control access to iTools actions (i.e. iTools_AllowEditMySettings, iTools_AllowExportPrintView, iTools_ShowBuilderLink)
CustomField.label: EnableCustomPermissions
